Plant-based protein sources, on the other hand, do not provide a full range of amino acids, and must be combined with other plant-based foods to provide a balanced protein intake.


Animal-based protein sources are also an excellent source of high-quality protein and fat, while plant-based protein sources provide a healthy dose of fiber and antioxidants.
